title: Project-Based Social Education Design Utilizing Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental data interpretation skills and social studies knowledge at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Evening/weekend intensive operations for working learners, with data collection and analysis using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Individual progress and participation rates can be predicted with over 80% accuracy by analyzing learners' project performance data.
At least three actionable strategies can be derived from learning analytics results to improve instructional design.
Learner interaction patterns in team project environments can be analyzed, visualized, and documented in a report.

resources: Learning Management System (LMS) Data Access Permissions
Google Analytics or Similar Web Analytics Tools

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
